00018 namespace x2d {
00019 namespace filesystem {
00020     
00021     typedef FILE fd_type;
00022     
00023     typedef basic_path<char, '/'> path;         
00024     typedef basic_directory_iterator<path> directory_iterator;
00025     
00026     /* 
00027      * Tell the compiler we are going to implement this
00028      */
00029     template<>
00030     directory_iterator::fs_obj_ptr directory_iterator::open_path( const directory_iterator::path_type& p );
00031     
00032     
00036     template<class _PathType>
00037     class fs_obj_impl : public fs_obj_base<_PathType> 
00038     {
00039     public:
00040         typedef _PathType path_type;
00041         typedef boost::shared_ptr<fs_obj_base<_PathType> > fs_obj_ptr;
00042 
00043         fs_obj_impl()
00044         : path_()
00045         , dir_handle_(NULL)
00046         , file_handle_(NULL)
00047         , ft_(type_undef)
00048         { 
00049         }
00050 
00056         fs_obj_impl(const path_type& p, DIR* d)
00057         : path_(p)
00058         , dir_handle_(d)
00059         , file_handle_(NULL)
00060         , ft_(type_dir)
00061         { 
00062         }
00063 
00069         fs_obj_impl(const path_type& p, FILE* f)
00070         : path_(p)
00071         , dir_handle_(NULL)
00072         , file_handle_(f)
00073         , ft_(type_file)
00074         { 
00075         }
00076         
00077         ~fs_obj_impl() {
00078             if(dir_handle_) 
00079             {
00080                 closedir(dir_handle_);   
00081             }
00082             if(file_handle_)
00083             {
00084                 fclose(file_handle_);  
00085             }
00086         }
00087         
00088         inline const file_type type() const 
00089         {
00090             return ft_; 
00091         }
00092 
00093         inline const path_type path() const
00094         { 
00095             return path_; 
00096         }
00097         
00098         fs_obj_ptr next();
00099         
00100         bool operator !=( const fs_obj_impl& fso ) 
00101         {
00102             return (fso.dir_handle_ != this->dir_handle_ ||
00103                     fso.file_handle_ != this->file_handle_);                               
00104         }
00105         
00106     private:
00107         const path_type         path_;
00108         DIR*                            dir_handle_;
00109         FILE*                           file_handle_;
00110         file_type                       ft_;
00111     };
00112     
00116     template<>          
00117     class ifd_basic_stream<fd_type> 
00118     {        
00119     public:
00120         ifd_basic_stream(fd_type* fp, long offset=0, long size=0) 
00121         : fp_(fp)
00122         , getter_(0)
00123         , start_(offset)
00124         , size_(size)
00125         {
00126             seekg(getter_, std::ios_base::beg);                         
00127         }
00128         
00129         long tellg() const 
00130         { 
00131             return getter_; 
00132         }
00133         
00134         void seekg(long off, std::ios_base::seekdir way=std::ios_base::cur) 
00135         { 
00136             switch (way) 
00137             {
00138                 case std::ios_base::beg:
00139                     getter_ = off;
00140                     fseek(fp_, start_+getter_, SEEK_SET);
00141                     break;
00142                 case std::ios_base::end:
00143                     getter_ = size_+off;
00144                     fseek(fp_, (start_+size_)+off, SEEK_SET);
00145                     break;
00146                     
00147                 default:        // Cur
00148                     getter_ += off;
00149                     fseek(fp_, off, SEEK_CUR);
00150                     break;
00151             }
00152             
00153             if(getter_ < 0 || getter_ >= size_) 
00154             {
00155                 close();
00156             }
00157         }       
00158         
00159         inline bool is_open() const 
00160         { 
00161             return fp_!=NULL; 
00162         }
00163         
00164         inline bool good() const 
00165         { 
00166             return fp_!=NULL; 
00167         }
00168         
00169         void close() 
00170         { 
00171             fclose(fp_); 
00172             fp_=NULL; 
00173         }
00174         
00175         inline const int peek() const 
00176         { 
00177             int c = fgetc(fp_); 
00178             ungetc(c, fp_); 
00179             return c; 
00180         }
00181         
00182         inline const int read(char *buf, long len) 
00183         { 
00184             if(getter_ + len >= size_) 
00185             {
00186                 len = size_ - getter_;
00187             }
00188             
00189             int bytes = fread(buf, 1, len, fp_); 
00190             getter_ += bytes;                           
00191             
00192             return bytes;
00193         }
00194         
00195         // Share the real file pointer
00196         inline fd_type* fd() 
00197         { 
00198             return fp_; 
00199         }
00200         
00201         inline const long offset() const 
00202         { 
00203             return start_; 
00204         }
00205         
00206         inline const long size() const 
00207         { 
00208             return size_; 
00209         }        
00210         
00211     private:
00212         fd_type    *fp_;
00213         long        getter_;
00214         long        start_;
00215         long        size_;
00216     };
00217     
00218     typedef ifd_basic_stream<fd_type> ifdstream;
00219     
00220 } // namespace filesystem
00221 } // namespace x2d
